page.title: 16The R.A.F.Fire station.
page.content: Here we saw a converted Range Rover,a {Tacr 2,}(Truck,Airfield,Crash,Rescue), which is designed to arrive first at any aircraft crash,& get people out safely.It carries 900 l of special light water to extinguish fuel fires, two different extinguishers,& metal cutting tools.Then we saw the{Mark 10. Its job is to fight fires.It carries 3680l of light water,& ordinary water, & takes 20 seconds to get to the airfield with a crew of 4.The steering wheel is in the centre of the dashboard The Station is manned 24 hours a day, the men,21 in all,working in 3 shifts. They have fire_resistant clothing, including string vests.Their special helmets are made of fibre_glass,with a visor of wire_strengthened,transparent & reflective material,& the gloves are canvas & aluminium.
